::Hot Rod::

Hot Rud runs up to Savanna.
"I guess we'll half to take a riencheck, on that drink. I'm going to be
in the CR chamber after this fight." He turns to Rhinox.
"Welcome to the party, Rhinox." Hot Rod then pulls the daggers out of
himself, and throws them at Koga.
